title: Ivalunga Imsai Thaanga Mudiyala Lyrics Kalakalappu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Ivalunga Imsai Thaanga Mudiyala
Singer: Amitabh Narayan
Movie: Kalakalappu @ Masala Cafe

Music: Vijay Ebenezer
Lyricist: Pa.Vijay

Azhaga azhaga sirukuraaluga
adudha nodiye morakiraaluga
usura usura nenaikuraaluga
udane udane marakuraaluga
experience ...

Ivaluga imisa thaangamudiyala
ivaluga ilaamalum, irukamudiyala (2)

Munnadi pona idikuraaluna
pinnadi pona odhaikuraaluga
ennapanuradhu ennapanuradhu
dharmaendhra

kuthunga yesamaan kuthunga - indha
ponnungale ippadithaan kuthunga (2)

Ivaluga imisa thaangamudiyala
ivaluga ilaamalum, irukamudiyala

Lip-la lipstic potukura
heart-ula helmet maatikura
ivaluga imisa o oh o..

Polapa keduthu deal viduva
porupa irunnum feel pannuva
ivaluga imisa o oh o..

Kannadhasanum sonnar
ada kamalahaasanum sonnar
water bottle-ayum
quater bottle-ayum
pirika mudiyuma paaru

unna solli kuthamilla
enna solli kuthamilla
kadhaloda kutham thaanada

kuthunga yesamaan kuthunga - indha
ponnungale ippadithaan kuthunga (2)

Ivaluga imisa thaangamudiyala
ivaluga ilaamalum, irukamudiyala

Adhuku siripa theriyalaye
erinju viluva puriyalaye
ivaluga imisa...

Aarambam love-la adhirumada
boogambam appuram kilambumada
imisa imisa..

Ada india-vil thaanda
dhammu adhigam vikkudhaam yenda ?
pugaya vittuthaan polambi thavikura
aangal kottithaal thaanda

love-kulla maatinaalum
stove-kulla maatinaalum
theenji povom
maapillangala!!

kuthunga yesamaan kuthunga - indha
ponnungale ippadithaan kuthunga (2)

Ivaluga imisa thaangamudiyala
ivaluga ilaamalum, irukamudiyala (2)

Munnadi pona idikuraaluna
pinnadi pona odhaikuraaluga

dharmaendhra
